mapper.select: select phone, username, image, password from user
select phone, username, image, password from user where phone = ( select friend_phone from user, friends where user.phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%') and user.phone = friends.phone )
select phone, username, image, password from user where username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
select phone, username, image, password from user where phone like concat('%', #{phone}, '%')
insert into user(phone, username, image, password) values(#{phone}, #{username}, #{image}, #{password})
mapper.delete: delete from user where username like concat('%', #{username}, '%')
mapper.update: update user set phone=#{phone}, username=#{username}, image=#{image}, password=#{password}
